Introduction

Welcome to Aircraft Checklist Pro. (v1.4.0)

Aircraft Checklist Pro gives you access to aircraft- specific checklists for all included Microsoft Flight Simulator aircraft. The 80+ page document provides you with everything you need to know to get your aircraft from a cold & dark state to the skies and then back to the ground again before shutting down.

All default aircraft are included in Aircraft Checklist Pro, including the newly added 40th Anniversary Edition planes and helicopters.

Our custom-made application will allow you to access the checklist directly from within the simulator itself. Find the aircraft you’re flying and follow the tried and tested checklists just as real- world pilots would do. You will also have access to the PDF document, which can be saved to any device of your choice.

Accessing Aircraft Checklist Pro In-Sim

You can access Aircraft Checklist Pro any time from within the simulator.

1 - When in-flight, hover your mouse above to the top of your screen to show the in-sim tool bar.

2 - Select the icon for ‘Aircraft Checklist Pro’

3 - A new in-sim pop-up will appear with Aircraft Checklist Pro

You can use this tool to search, find keywords and skip to relevant pages.

Accessing Aircraft Checklist Pro as a PDF

You can access Aircraft Checklist Pro at any time as a PDF by navigating to the product folder.

[Community Folder]\sofly-aircraft-checklist-pro\ inc\pdf\

You can then share or copy this PDF to any device of your choosing.

Note, the PDF can be found for PC users only.

AIRBUS A310-300

Before start

  • COCKPIT PREP COMPLETED
  • SIGNS ON/AUTO
  • FUEL QUANTITY ___ KG/LB
  • NAVIGATION CHECKED/SET
  • LDG ELEV ___SET
  • BRK-A/SKID NORM/ON
  • SIGNS ON/AUTO
  • WINDOWS/DOORS CLOSED
  • BEACON ON
  • PARKING BRAKE ON

AFTER START

  • PITCH TRIM SET
  • RUDDER TRIM ZERO
  • SPOILERS ARMED
  • SLATS/FLAPS ___/___
  • ECAM STATUS CHECKED
  • ANTI ICE AS RQRD
  • HAND SIGNAL RECEIVED

Before Takeoff

  • FLIGHT CONTROLS CHECKED
  • BRIEFING CONFIRMED
  • SLATS/FLAPS __/__
  • PERFORMANCE/FMAS CHECK/READ
  • TO CONFIG CHECKED
  • TRANSPONDER SET
  • CABIN SECURE
  • TCAS TA/RA
  • PACKS AS RQRD
  • IGNITION AS RQRD
  • ANTI-ICE AS RQRD

AFTER TAKEOFF/CLIMB

  • SLATS/FLAPS RETRACTED
  • LDG GEAR UP/NEUTRAL
  • PACKS ON
  • ALTIMETERS ___SET

APPROACH

  • SIGNS SET
  • BRIEFING CONFIRMED
  • ECAM STATUS CHECKED
  • ALTIMETERS ___SET
  • MINIMUMS ___SET
  • IGNITION AS RQRD
  • LDG ELEV ___SET

LANDING

  • LANDING GEAR DOWN
  • AUTOBRAKE AS RQRD
  • ANTI SKID CHECKED
  • SLATS/FLAPS ___/___
  • SPOILERS ARMED

AFTER LANDING

  • SLATS/FLAPS RETRACTED
  • TRANSPONDER AS RQRD
  • WX RADAR OFF
  • SPOILERS DISARMED
  • APU STARTED

PARKING

  • APU BLEED AS RQRD
  • ENGINES OFF
  • DIFF PRESS CHECK ZERO
  • LIGHTS/SIGNS AS RQRD
  • FUEL PUMPS OFF
  • WINDOW AND PROBE HEAT OFF
  • PARKING BRK & CHOCKS AS RQRD

SECURING THE AIRCRAFT

  • NAV SYSTEMS OFF
  • OXYGEN OFF
  • APU BLEED OFF
  • EMER EXIT LT DISARMED
  • APU AND BAT OFF

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

AIRBUS A320NEO

Before start

  • COCKPIT PREP COMPLETED
  • GEAR PINS AND COVER REMOVED
  • SIGNS ON/AUTO
  • ADIRS NAV
  • FUEL QUALITY ___KG/LB
  • TO DATA SET
  • BARO REF __SET
  • WINDOWS/DOORS CLOSED
  • BEACON ON
  • THE LEVERS IDLE
  • PARKING BRAKE AS RQRD

AFTER START

  • ANTI ICE AS RQRD
  • ECAM STS CHECKED
  • PITCH TRIM __SET
  • RUDDER TRIM ZERO

Before Takeoff

  • FLIGHT CONTROLS CHECKED
  • FLT INST CHECKED
  • BRIEFING CONFIRMED
  • FLAP SETTING CONFIG__
  • V1/VR/V2/FLEX __
  • ATC SET SET
  • ECAM MEMO TO NO BLUE
  • CABIN CREW ADVISED
  • TCAS TA/RA
  • ENG MODE SEL AS RQRD
  • PACKS AS RQRD

AFTER TAKEOFF/CLIMB

  • LDG GEAR UP
  • FLAPS RETRACTED
  • PACKS ON
  • BARO REF ___SET

APPROACH

  • ECAM STS CHECKED
  • SEAT BELTS ON

  • MDA/DH __SET
  • ENG MODE SEL AS RQRD

  • CABIN CREW ADVISED
  • A/THR LDG NO BLUE

AFTER LANDING

  • FLAPS RETRACTED
  • SPOILERS DISARMED
  • APU START
  • RADAR OFF/STBY
  • PSW OFF

PARKING

  • APU BLEED ON
  • ENGINES OFF
  • SEAT BELTS OFF
  • EXTERNAL LIGHTS AS RQRD
  • FUEL PUMPS OFF
  • PARK BRK AND CHOCKS AS RQRD

SECURING THE AIRCRAFT

  • ADIRS OFF
  • OXYGEN OFF
  • APU BLEED OFF
  • EMER EXIT LT OFF
  • NO SMOKING OFF

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

AVIAT PITTS SPECIAL S-1S

Before start

  • IGNITION KEY OFF
  • ATTERY MASTER SWITCH OFF

ENGINE START

  • BRAKES SET
  • FUEL SELECTOR ON
    (TOP LEFT POSITION)
  • MIXTURE FULL RICH
  • THROTTLE 1/4 OPEN
  • FUEL PUMP SWITCH ON
  • MIXTURE IDLE CUTOFF
  • IGNITION KEY START
  • MIXTURE FULL RICH
    WHEN ENGINE STARTS
  • IGNITION KEY BOTH
  • OIL PRESSURE BOTH
  • FUEL PUMP SWITCH OFF
  • FUEL PUMP SWITCH ON

TAXI

  • BRAKES RELEASE
  • BRAKES CHECK
  • FLIGHT INSTRUMENTS CHECK

BEFORE TAKEOFF

  • MIXTURE CHECK FULL RICH
  • TRIM NEUTRAL
    (HANDLE ON THE LEFT HORIZONTAL)
  • FLIGHT CONTROLS FREED AND CORRECT
  • ENGINE INSTRUMENTS ON

TAKE OFF

  • THROTTLE FULL
  • 59 KIAS ROTATE
  • CLIMB 87 KIAS

CLIMB

  • FUEL PUMP SWITCH OFF
  • SPEED 104 KIAS
  • MIXTURE AS RQRD

CRUISE

  • THROTTLE 2100 - 2700 RPM
  • MIXTURE LEAN 1 INCH

LANDING

  • MIXTURE FULL RICH
  • FUEL PUMP SWITCH ON

AFTER LANDING

  • FUEWL PUMP SWITCH OFF
  • TRIM NEUTRAL

PARKING

  • THROTTLE CLOSED
  • MIXTURE IDLE CUTOFF
  • BATTERY MASTER SWITCH OFF
  • ALTERNATOR SWITCH OFF
  • IGNITION KEY OFF

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

AVIAT PITTS SPECIAL S-2S

Before start

  • FUEL QUALITY CHECKED
  • BRAKES SET
  • ALL ELECTRIC OFF
  • AVIONICS MASTER OFF

ENGINE START

  • FUEL VALVE ON
    (TOP LEFT POSITION)
  • COWL FLAP OPEN
  • PROP LEVER FULL FORWARD
  • MIXTURE LEVER FULL RICH
  • THROTTLE FULL OPEN
  • BATTERY ON
    (THIRD SWITCH)
  • BOOST PUMP ON 4 SECONS
  • THROTTLE 1/2 INCH OPEN
  • MIXTURE IDLE CUT-OFF
  • AREA CLEAR
  • STARTER KEY ENGAGE
  • MIXTURE FULL FORWARD
    (WHEN ENGINE FIRES)

AFTER START

  • THROTTLE 1000 RPM
  • OIL PRESSURE CHECK
  • ALTERNATOR FIELD SWITCH ON & CHECK
  • AVIONICS SWITCH ON

BEFORE TAKEOFF

  • BRAKERS SET
  • TAIL WHEEL STRAIGHT
  • OIL TEMP GREEN
  • COWL FLAP OPEN
  • MIXTURE FULL RICH
  • THROTTLE 1700 RPM
  • OIL PRESSURE & TEMP GREEN
  • AMMETER CHECKED
  • PROP CYCLE
  • THROTTLE 2200 RPM
  • MAGS LEFT, BOTH, RRIGHT BOTH
    (MAX DROP 50 RPM; MAX DIFF 175 RPM)
  • THROTTLE IDLE
  • THROTTLE 1000 RPM
  • FLAT CONTROLS FREE & CORRECT
  • ELEVATOR TRIM NEUTRAL
    (HANDLE ON THE LEFT HORIZONTAL)
  • FUEL SELECTOR CHECK ON
  • BOOST PUMP ON
  • BRAKES RELEASE

TAKE OFF

  • THROTTLE FULL
  • 70 mpg ROTATE
  • CLIMB 90MPH

AFTER TAKE OFF

  • PROP LEVER AS RQRD
  • FUEL PUMP OFF

LANDING

  • BOOST PUMP ON
  • COWL FLAP CLOSED
  • MIXTURE SET
  • PROP LEVER FULL FORWARD

LANDING

  • BOOST PUMP ON
  • COWL FLAPH CLOSED
  • MIXTURE SET
  • PROP LEVER FULL FORWARD

AFTER LANDING

  • COWL FLAP OPEN
  • BOOST PUMP OFF
  • TRANSPONDER STBY

PARKING

  • THROTTLE 1000 RPM
  • AVIONICS MASTER OFF
  • ALTERNATOR FIELD OFF
  • MAGNETOR GROUP CHECK
  • MIXTURE IDLE CUT OFF
  • IGNITION KEY OFF
  • MASTER SWITCH OFF

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

BOEING B747-8I

PRE-FLIGHT

  • PARKING BRAKE ON
  • TROTTLE IDLE
  • GEAR LEVER CHECK DOWN
  • FLAPS UP
  • SPEED BRAKE RETRACTED
  • BATTERY SWITCH ON
  • STANDBY POWER SWITCH AUTO
  • ADIRS ALL NAV
  • FUEL CONTROL SWITCHES CUTOFF
  • NAV & LOGO LIGHT ON
  • APU AS RQRD
  • FLIGHT INSTRUMENTS SET
  • ALTIMETERS __SET
  • FUEWL QUANTITY SETUP

BEFORE START

  • FUEL PUMPS ON/AS RQRD
  • SEAT BELTS SIGNS ON
  • WINDOWS/DOORS CEHCK CLOSED
  • ENGINE BLEEDS SET
  • APU BLEED SET
  • RECALL CHECKED
  • BEACON LIGHT ON/LWR
  • TRANSPONDER SET/STBY

AFTER START

  • APU OFF
  • ANTI ICE AS RQRD
  • REF SPEEDS CHECKED
  • RECALL CHECKED
  • AUTOBRAKES RTO
  • GROUND EQUIPMENT CLEAR
  • FLAPS __SET
  • FLIGHT CONTROLS CHECKED
  • TAXI/RWY LIGHTS ON
  • PARKING BRAKE OFF

BEFORE TAKE OFF

  • DEPARTURE BRIEFING COMPLETE
  • CABIN READY
  • LANDING LIGHTS ON
  • STROBE LIGHTS ON
  • TRANSPONDER TA/RA
  • WEATHER RADAR AS RQRD

AFTER TAKE OFF

  • LANDING GEAR UP
  • TAXI/RWY LIGHTS OFF
  • FLAPS UP
  • ALTIMETERS STD SET

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

BOEING F/A-18E/F

Before start

  • APU SWITCH OFF
  • LDG/TAXI LIGHT SWITCH OFF
  • THROTTLES OFF
  • EXTR LTS MSTR SWITCH FORWARD
    (SIDE OF THROTTLE)
  • PARKING BRAKE SET
  • ANTI-SKID SWITCH ON
  • FLAPS SWITCH AUTO
  • LANDING GEAR LEVER DOWN
  • L(R)DDI,HUD,UFCD&MCPD KNOBS OFF
  • VOLUME KNOBS OFF
  • HOOK LEVER UP, LIGHT OUT
  • WINGFOLD SWITCH CHECK
    MATCHING ACTUAL WING POSITION
  • GENERATOR SWITCHES NORM
  • BATTERY SWITCH OFF
  • INT LIGHT SWITCHES AS RQRD

ENGINE START

  • BATTERY SWITCH ON
  • APU SWITCH ON
  • APU READY LIGHT CHECK ON
    WHEN RIGHT RPM HITS 10%
  • ENGINE CRANK SWITCH R
    WHEN RIGHT RPM HITS 10%
  • RIGHT THROTTLE IDLE
  • RIGHT OIL PRESS CHECK MIN 10 PSI
    (WITHIN 30 SECS)
  • RIGHT EGT CHECK 871 ̊C MAX
  • L(R) DDI, HUD & MCPD KNOBS ON
  • BLEED AIR KNOB. NORM
  • ENGINE CRANK SWITCH L
    WHEN LEFT RPM HITS 10%
  • LEFT THROTTLE IDLE
  • LEFT OIL PRESS CHECK MIN 10 PSI
    (WITHIN 30 SECS)
  • LEFT EGT. CHECK 871 ̊C MAX
  • ENG CRANK SWITCH CHECK OFF

BEFORE TAXI

  • UFCD KNOB ON
  • WINGFOLD SWITCH SPREAD
  • FLIGHT CONTROLS FREE & CORRECT
  • TRIM 4 ̊ NU
  • ALTIMETER SET
  • FLAPS SWITCH HALF
  • APU CHECK OFF
  • NOSE WHEEL STEERING ENGAGE
    (BUTTON BACKSIDE OF STICK)
  • LDG/TAXI LIGHT ON
  • PARKING BRAKE RELEASE

BEFORE TAKE OFF

  • FLIGHT CONTROLS FREE & CORRECT
  • WINGS CHECK SPREAD & LOCKED
  • FLAPS CHECK HALF
  • HOOK CHECK UP, LIGHT OUT

TAKE OFF

  • THROTTLES MIL (MAX IF RQRD)
  • ±165 KIAS ROTATE
  • LANDING GEAR UP
  • FLAPS AUTO

AFTER TAKE OFF

  • LANDING GEAR CHECK UP
  • FLAPS CHECK AUTO
  • LDG/TAXI LIGHT OFF

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

CUBCRAFTERS NXCUB

Before start

  • FLIGHT CONTROLS FREE & CORRECT
  • MASTER SWITCH ON
  • TRIM CHECK AND SET FOR TAKEOFF
  • FUEL SELECTOR FULLEST TANK
  • FUEL QUANTITY CHECK
    (ON THE INSIDE OF THE WINGS)
  • MIXTURE IDLE CUTOFF

BEFORE START

  • PARKING BREAKES SET
  • FUEL SELECTOR FULLEST TANK
  • AVIONICS MASTER SWITCH OFF
  • NAV & STROBE LIGHTS ON

ENGINE START

  • MASTER SWITCH CHECK ON
  • PROP LEVER FULL FORWARD
  • MIXTURE LEVER FULL RICH
  • THROTTLE FULL FORWARD
  • FUEL PUMP ON, CHECK FOR FUEL FLOW
  • FUEL PUMP OFF
  • THROTTLE 1/2 INCH OPEN
  • PROP AREA CLEAR
  • STARTER KEY START
    (RELEASE WHEN ENGINE FIRES)

AFTER START

  • OIL PRESSURE CHECK
  • THROTTLE 1000 RPM
  • ALTERNATOR FIELD SWITCH ON
  • AVIONICS MASTER SWITCH ON
  • ALTIMETER SET

TAXI

  • PARKING BRAKES OFF
  • TOE BRAKES CHECK
  • FLIGHT INSTRUMENTS CHECK

BEFORE TAKE OFF

  • PARKING BRAKES SET
  • THROTTLE 1700 RPM
  • IGNITION L, BOTH, R, BOTH
  • ENGINE INSTRUMENTS CHECK
  • PROP EXERCISE TWICE, THEN
    FULL FORWARD
  • THROTTLE CHECK IDLE
  • THROTTLE 1000 RPM
  • FLIGHT INSTRUMENTS CHECK
  • FUEL SELECTOR FULLEST TANK
  • PROP FULL FORWARD
  • MIXTURE FULL RICH
  • TRIM SET
  • FLAPS FIRST NOTCH
  • FLIGHT CONTROLS FREE & CORRECT
  • TRANSPONDER ON & SET
  • LANDING LIGHTS ON
  • IGNITION CHECK BOTH
  • PARKINNG BRAKE RELEASE

TAKE OFF

  • THROTTLES FULL
  • 50 KIAS ROTATE
  • CLIMB 60 KIAS
    @ SAFE ALTITUDE
  • FLAPS RETRACT

CLIMB

  • PROP 2600RPM
  • MIXTURE LEAN FOR MAX RPM
  • LANDING LIGHTS OFF

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.

Page 15

CURTISS JN-4 JENNY

BEFORE START

  • FLIGHT CONTROLS FREE & CORRECT
  • FUEL SHUT OFF VALVE CLOSES
    (TURN RED VALVE ON THE RIGHT CLOCKWISE)
  • FUEL CUT OFF RING AFT
    (BLACK LEVER ON THE LEFT)
  • MAGNETO BREAKERS OUT
    (TWO BLACK BUTTONS ABOVE MAGNETO LEVER)
  • MIXTURE/CHOKE FULLY IN
    (NEXT TO FUEL CUT OFF RING)
  • PROPELLER STILL

ENGINE START

  • FUEL SHUT OFF VALVE OPEN
    (TURN COUNTERCLOCKWISE)
  • FUEL CUT OFF RING IN
  • MAGNETO LEVER IN
  • MAGNETO BREAKERS IN
  • MIXTURE/CHOKE FULLY OUT
  • THROTTLE OPEN 1⁄2 INCH
  • PROPELLER AREA CLEAR
  • PROPELLER HANDCRANK
    (CLICK PROP)
  • PANEL LIGHT AS RQRD
    (SWITCH BELOW TEMPERATURE INDICATOR)

BEFORE TAXI

  • ALTITUDE RING SET

TAXI

!WARNING!
THIS AIRCRAFT HAS NO BRAKES

TAKE OFF

  • STICK HOLD SLIGHTLY BACK
  • THROTTLE SLOWLY INCREASE TO FULL
    LET THE AIRCRAFT LIFT OFF BY ITSELF

CRUISE

  • RPM 1100
  • CRUISE ALTITUDE 500-1000FT
  • ENGINE GAUGES CHECK WITHIN LIMITS

LANDING

    TAXI

    !WARNING!
    THIS AIRCRAFT HAS NO SPEED INDICATOR

  • THROTTLE SET TO 1/4 INCH OPEN
  • MIXTURE RICH
  • FUEL PUMP ON, THEN OFF
  • IGNITION SWITCH START
  • OIL PRESSURE CHKED

AFTER START

  • THROTTLE IDLE (600-800 RPM)
  • AVIONICS ON
  • FUEL PUMP OFF
  • FLAPS ASRQRD
  • LIGHTS SET AS RQRD

BEFORE TAKE OFF

  • FLIGHT CONTROLS CHKD
  • TRIM SET FOR T/O
  • FUEL SELECTOR CONFIRM POSITION
  • WEATHER/WIND CHEKED
  • RUNWAY CLEAR

AFTER TAKE OFF

  • FLAPS RETRACT
  • THROTTLE SET FOR CLIMB POWER
  • ALTITUDE MAIN SAFE CLIMB ALT

APPROACH / LANDING

  • APPROACH SPEED MAINTAIN (60-70KTS)
  • FLAPS ASRQRD
  • FINAL APPROACH PATH STABLE

AFTER LDG / PARKING

  • FLAPS RETRACT TO UP
  • THROTTLE IDLE
  • TAXI LIGHTS ON
  • PARKING BRAKE SET
  • ENGINE SHUTDOWN
  • MASTER SWITCH OFF
  • CONTROL LOCK REAPPLY

Not to be used for real-world navigation or aviation purposes.
